ygData.subject: Re: Totally off topic (sorry guys)
ygData.msgSnippet: Azbokin, Yes a cleric can wear banded armor.  My enchanter is also a master smith and for a full suit to be made with no failures would cost me around 35pp I
ygData.messageBody:
Azbokin,

Yes a cleric can wear banded armor. My enchanter is also a master smith and
for a full suit to be made with no failures would cost me around 35pp I
believe. I dont think you would find anyone selling you a set for less
then 50pp and that would be low. Also keep in mind that gloves cannot be
made.

Morell Lv 11 Enchanter and Master Smith "Noble Lions"
Tarew Marr
-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 28, 1999 7:16 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Totally off topic (sorry guys)


>From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>

>
